original_title: 日本暴力地帯 美しき野望
overview: Kiyotsugu Kito, the punisher of darkness, meets Misa, a young widow of Sakakigumi, who is directly attending the Owada group. Misa decides to disband Sakakigumi and return to Katagi, but she overcomes the opposition of her members and she establishes a civil engineering company.  Tokuto Mii! This is the gangster Otoshimae!
title: 日本暴力地帯 美しき野望
